net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes

Class AbstractBayesianClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier
      • net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes.AbstractBayesianClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Classifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KDependentBayesClassifier, NaiveBayesClassifier

    public class AbstractBayesianClassifier
extends AbstractClassifier
    Abstract Bayesian classifier (supervised). This classifier calculates and stores Bayesian frequencies (numerator of Bayesian probabilities) out of the dataset. Specific Bayesian models build further on this class (Naive Bayes, KDB, ...)
    Author:
    Lieven Baeyens
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • AbstractBayesianClassifier

        public AbstractBayesianClassifier(boolean lap,
                          boolean log,
                          boolean sparse)
        Instantiate the Abstract Bayesian classifier algorithm.
        Parameters:
        lap - laplace correction
        log - logarithmic results to avoid rounding results to zero because of limited computer precision
        sparse - sparseness of used dataset
